description: It is not the lack of produce but lack of staff due to Covid-19, one report says. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Shanghai residents under Covid-19 lockdown have trouble getting fresh produce
title_page: Shanghai residents under Covid-19 lockdown have trouble getting fresh produce | The Straits Times
maintext:
SHANGHAI (CAIXIN GLOBAL) - Residents in many neighbourhoods of Shanghai are having trouble getting their hands on fresh produce, as stricter Covid-19 lockdowns prevent delivery drivers and other key logistics staff from working.
As more and more neighbourhoods go under lockdown across the city of 25 million, multiple residents stuck at home told Caixin that they have found it difficult to purchase fresh meat and vegetables on online platforms such as Meituan.
